subject: Attention Dear Beneficiary/Con
body:
Attention Dear Beneficiary/Contractor.
Sir,
 
Concerning a total of the  $10.5M plus accrued interest payment under your names as beneficiary                                                                                                                                                           We must be frank how would you feel if eventually  this your payment is cancelled by fiat authoritative order for your non compliance following  with NFIU as regards your company payment  non registration with Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) as we start the  year 2024 first quarter, or do you  want to start afresh in securing and making payments again for revalidation of your contracts documents for the fiscal year 2024?.
what sense does it make to you after all the monies you have spent  both the monies you have spent in the hands of impostors, that impersonating the staff office of the federal republic of Nigeria and intensionally want to divert the fund which you have been dealing with for over the years according to your file.
Today, we are willing and you have only by tomorrow, Should you still delay,  the payment is going to be finally cancelled,
 complying with NFIU on the oath declarations, at the High Court, which certified that your esteemed company is an existing company here in Nigeria that executed and completed the contract even under the new Authority,  as NNPC stated which the outstanding payment this office is now directing to wire to your bank account, via our correspondence bank.
Let me also be sincere, you do the right thing at the right time.
We honestly concerned about your plight over the years to actualize this payment, as revealed by your File here through this office, we hope to resolved and vowed to perfect this situation at this point so you redeem your  payment,, but like I have mentioned to you, we can not establish this Legality without your Command and unflinching Cooperation.
I honestly advise that you do the needful now to guarantee your  USD10.5M Swift wire transfer accordingly to your account as we programmed through our correspondence bank
I await your prompt and positive compliance to fulfill our rightly Official Obligation to you and put everlasting smiles on your face.
GOOD DAY,
DR AHMED BELLO, CHIEF/PROCUREMENT AND RESEARCH OFFICER, NIGERIA DEBT MANAGEMENT BOARD, DMO.

subject: Re: Attention Dear Beneficiary/Con
body:
Dear Dr. Ahmed Bello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment under my name. I appreciate your concern and willingness to help resolve this situation. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

Could you please provide more details about the payment and the contracts documents you mentioned? I want to ensure that everything is in order and legitimate.

Additionally, could you clarify what NFIU stands for and how it relates to my payment? I want to make sure that all necessary procedures are followed correctly.

Lastly, could you explain why there is a possibility of my payment being cancelled? Is there anything specific that needs to be done on my end to prevent this from happening?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter.

Best wishes,
Shirley
